page.title: 05A NEW GAS PIPELINE
page.content: A new{gas pipeline}has been layed under the Brighton and Portsmouth railway and over farmland and then under the A27.The part that went under the A27 had to be dug up and traffic diverted.They came to the{creek}and found that rather a problem.As the pipe is 16 inches wide and covering a distance of two miles and weighing over 150 tonnes it was quite difficult to move,so they put the pipeline on rollers to move it more easily.Early one morning in July a team of men came to inspect the pipeline before it went under the sea.By mid-morning the pipe had been moved into the water.By the evening it was completly under the creek.The pipe was moved by floats on either side of the pipe.Care had to be taken not to damage the{reed beds}or disturb the{wildfowl.}More{Roman } remains were found whilst excavating.
